changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "action" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "ts" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "deleted_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "type" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "status" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "started_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "finished_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "error_message" TEXT NULL, "pipeline_id" UUID NOT NULL, "execution_agent_id" UUID NOT NULL, -- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("pipeline_id") REFERENCES "pipeline" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY ("execution_agent_id") REFERENCES "agent" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE );
